Title: Rename 'Sales Navigation Options' to 'Tract Navigation Options'
Description: Terminology does not match WoodPro vocabulary.
Expected Changes: Update label to 'Tract Navigation Options'.
Feature Request Response: Updated in UI by April 7 release.

Title: Fix title block text in Print layout
Description: Print output had incorrect field mapping for title block.
Expected Changes: Correct field mapping for title block text on print.

Title: Remove report button from header
Description: Header includes an unnecessary 'report' button.
Expected Changes: Remove report button from header bar.

Title: Fix missing profile on startup
Description: Profile was not loading on application startup.
Expected Changes: Ensure default profile loads at launch.

Title: Add query definitions to navigation layers
Description: Tract Points and Geometry Layers lack query filters.
Expected Changes: Apply query definitions based on Navigation Options fields.

Title: Simplify CSP Tract Points symbology
Description: Symbols are too varied and hard to interpret.
Expected Changes: Use single symbol type, distinguish by company vs supplier.

Title: Enable multi-select for Location and Forester picklists
Description: Currently limited to single selection in filters.
Expected Changes: Allow users to select multiple values.

Title: Toggle layer visibility by symbol in TOC
Description: TOC does not allow toggling visibility of unique value layers.
Expected Changes: Enable toggling by unique symbol group in Table of Contents.

Title: Create geometry from Report-All in Edit
Description: No current function to create from Report-All result.
Expected Changes: Add support for geometry creation from report-all query.

Title: Enable shape upload in Edit menu
Description: Edit options do not currently support shape upload.
Expected Changes: Allow shape file uploads directly via Edit panel.

Title: Change zoom level on point select
Description: Selecting a point does not zoom in enough for detail.
Expected Changes: Modify zoom level to be closer when selecting a point.

Title: Add scale limits to CSP Points
Description: CSP Points display too early on the scale range.
Expected Changes: Add scale limits to control CSP Points visibility.

Title: center on / extent based on navigation
Download Format Clarifications
Description: Ensure clarity on available download formats
Expected Changes:
• Confirm that  Shapefile (.shp)  remains the only supported format for downloads.
• Provide  clear documentation  that users can convert shapefiles to other formats using external tools.

Title: Search Feature Improvements
Description: Optimize the Search feature to encourage more usage
Expected Changes:
• Increase  visibility and accessibility  of the Search tool in the UI.
• Add  usage tracking  (if possible) to evaluate actual adoption and effectiveness.
• Provide  in-app guidance or a short tutorial  to highlight its availability and benefits.

Title: Upload Function Retention & Enhancements
Description: Ensure the Upload feature remains available and improve ease of use
Expected Changes: Maintain  upload functionality  as users rely on it.Enhance  user guidance or tooltips  to improve adoption and reduce the need for support inquiries.

Title: Basemap Selection Optimization
Description: Add new Basemap
Expected Changes: Add USGS National Map (Topo)

Title: Acreage Tracking
Description: Enhance the Editor to provide more accurate acreage tracking to reduce audit discrepancies
Expected Changes:
• Enable  point-based acreage validation  within the Editor to improve alignment with enrollment standards.
• Develop an  official mapped acreage reference layer  to be the primary source of truth for acreage, reducing reliance on third-party plans.

Title: Print Map functionality (layout)
Description: Improve  layout options  for better formatting and presentation
Expected Changes: Will need to discuss

Title: Print Map functionality (map framing, selection box)
Description: Enhance  map framing  by allowing users to  drag a selection box  to define the area of interest (AOI) instead of the current clunky method.
Expected Changes: Will need to discuss

Title: Print Map functionality (remove from editor)
Description: • Move the Print Map feature to the  Viewer only  (remove from the Editor).
Expected Changes: Will need to discuss

Title: Plot Location - Not saved to markup
Description: should be able to export timber cruise plot tool for export. points are not exported out as lat / long.

Title: Rainfall background opacity
Description: When viewing rainfall amounts in the legend is visible opacity of the background changes sufficiently to obfuscate data when viewed against the legend.
Expected Changes: Legend, when displayed should not change opacity of background. Potentially, including legend as a fixed region on the screen, and not a window or within the side bar itself.

Title: Results panel - Display
Description: Field aliases should be used when data is listed in the Results panel.

Title: symbology and labeling
Description: improve symbology and labeling so they are more easily visible.  The black, dark, small, etc. is so hard to see, especially if using the darker imagery.

Title: iOS and android app
Description: App Store branded app which logs in and displays woodpro in default mobile browser

Title: Print selected feature only
Description: Ability to select single poly for printing when multiple polys are visible on map

Title: Increase line road width
Description: Road lines are difficult to see.  Ability for user to increase road width 1pt 2pt 3pt etc, or generally increase road width to 2pt to enhance visibility.

Title: Turn off Basemaps entirely
Description: Provide toggle / ability for user to turn off all underlying basemap layers

Title: Search bar could include all variables not just tract name?
Feature Request Response:
which search? the quick select navigation dropbox can include any field you want, but all fields would be tool many
the top quick navigation tool isn’t a search tool, all data is loaded client-side, use of autocomplete might feel like search

Title: Bids
Description: Multi-row input form is not clear. Potential rearrangement to vertical arrangement  or otherwise label each field
Feature Request Response:
bids and inventory grids vary by client, use of grid was a short-cut
for some clients, some fields are calculated, not used for data entry
I think the 3-row version is more complicated then the 2-row version, but doesn’t give much space for a comment field

Title: Jasper Reports
Description: Column sort possible?
Feature Request Response:
I do not know, I don’t have jasper reports on local dev
answer may depend on the jasper output, csv - yes, pdf - no

Title: Map to include qr code link to avenza?
Expected Changes: QR code to provide Google / Apple maps x/y navigation link
Feature Request Response:
print page is a Pro page layout, can easily add images to title block
what would this qr code say or do?

Title: Add mill name label option for clarity
Description: Add toggle to view mill at much greater zoom level. 1:1,000,000 to 1:5,000,000?

Title: Remove waypoint markers
Description: No way to remove waypoint markers?
Feature Request Response: correct, no way to remove markers one at a time, close and reopen panel will clear them all

Description:
1. Save the finalized route as part of the project or export it in a printable format.
2. Use the Print tool in the Quick Access Toolbar to generate a map or detailed directions in PDF format.

the route tool doesn’t create travel directions, purpose was to calculate time and distance, the route line is a QC check
